law.catch_line: Copies of law to local school board and school-based decision making council.
law.text: The Department of Education shall send copies of KRS 158.181 to 158.187 to each local school board and school-based decision making council in Kentucky on an annual basis.
law.history: Created 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 294, sec. 6, effective July 15, 1998.
